alert.note: Alert for Brunswick; Lunenburg; Mecklenburg (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 7:29PM EDT until July 01 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Mecklenburg County in south central Virginia... Southeastern Lunenburg County in south central Virginia... Southern Brunswick County in south central Virginia... * Until 800 PM EDT. * At 729 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dundas, or 9 miles northeast of South Hill, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Alberta around 740 PM EDT. Brodnax around 745 PM EDT. Lawrenceville around 755 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Bacons Fork, Danieltown, Cochran, Gills Corner, Edgerton, Bowens Corner, Meredithville, Forksville and Prices Mill. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
